example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ-1 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM السائح) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الالماني)) (NP (NOUN_PROP بول) (NOUN_PROP هوفمان))) (PUNC ,) (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+CASE_INDEF_ACC متحدثاً) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحراس)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المتمركزين) (PP-LOC (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN سطح) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفندق))))))))) (PUNC :)

arg.g: about the guards stationed on the roof of the hotel
